remarks.para: May be inoperative provided landing gear strut is checked for proper inflation and extension.

placard.para: Placard on affected strut gauge: "____ MAIN (or NOSE) STRUT GAUGE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Use external pressure gauge. Check shock strut for proper inflation and extension as specified on placard located on shock strut (wing or body gear) or adjacent to strut in wheel well (nose gear). If required, service shock strut (AMM 12-15-03/301, AMM 12-15-04/301 or AMM 12-15-05/301).
